name: .IMAGEPORTFOLIOLIBRARY File Extension
summary: Learn about .IMAGEPORTFOLIOLIBRARY files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an IMAGEPORTFOLIOLIBRARY file with Corel Painter. For example, to open an IMAGEPORTFOLIOLIBRARY file, select Window → Media Panels → Images and click the "Import Image Portfolio" icon in the "Image Portfolio" tab.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
